price: Na vivuli vyake vitakuwa karibu yao, na mashada ya matunda yataning'inia mpaka chini.
arabic: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيۡهِمۡ ظِلَٰلُهَا وَذُلِّلَتۡ قُطُوفُهَا تَذۡلِيلٗا
footnotes: Na Pepo ambayo vivuli vya miti yake vimeenea kote kote, na matunda yake mepesi kuyachuma.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wadāniyatan ʿalayhim ẓilāluhā wadhullilat quṭūfuhā tadhlīlan
